# R for Bioinformatics analysis {#r4bioinformatics}

First, let's start with the basic syntax of `Markdown`.

## Markdown Syntax

Markdown syntax is generally used to convert plain text into special formatting. This way, markdown files appear as plain text, but once rendered, they can have special formatting.

There's no need to remember all the syntax, just remember a few commonly used ones. If you encounter something you don't know, simply google it.
